alert.note: Alert for Brown (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 09 at 8:40PM CDT until further notice by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois... Illinois River at Hardin. Illinois River at La Grange LD. Illinois River at Meredosia. Illinois River at Valley City. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Illinois River at La Grange LD. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 23.0 feet, Adjacent farmland and wetlands begins flooding. Island Road across the river in western Cass County begins flooding. At 24.0 feet, Extensive wetland acreage south of La Grange begins flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 23.4 feet and rising. - Recent Activity...The river first reached flood stage early Friday morning and has continued a slow rise since. - Forecast...The river is expected to continue rising, with a potential crest near 23.7 feet on Wednesday. - Flood stage is 23.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Wed Thu Illinois River La Grange LD 23.0 23.4 Sat 7 pm 23.5 23.6 23.6 23.6 23.6 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
